pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This package is for both x86 and x86_64 (multilib). Dependencies are LTS (long term support in other distros) but less secure with the older xorg-server-1.19.x.
For unilib x86_64 only, see amdgpu-pro instead.
This package is not recommended for security reasons. Consider using amdgpu-pro package instead.
To switch to the pro-stack (Pro OpenGL, default) do: eselect opengl set amdgpu-pro
To switch to the open-stack (Mesa OpenGL) do: eselect opengl set amdgpu
The following are required for package.{accept_keywords,mask,unmask}:
Temporary masks required:
>x11-base/xorg-drivers-1.19 >x11-base/xorg-server-1.19 >=x11-drivers/xf86-video-ati-19.1.0 >=x11-drivers/xf86-video-amdgpu-19.1.0 >=x11-drivers/xf86-input-libinput-0.29.0 ]>
